title: Strengthening Computer Science Curriculum Evaluation Competencies: A Rubric-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computer science concepts and familiarity with educational assessment tools
context.additional_context: A course targeting office/administrative working learners, emphasizing the enhancement of educational equity and accessibility evaluation capabilities

learning_goals: Participants can systematically evaluate educational design elements of computer science curricula using rubrics.
Participants can identify equity and accessibility elements within curricula by applying assessment rubrics.
Participants can propose curriculum improvement plans reflecting learners' cultural backgrounds.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
